SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_SETDOUBLESPONSOREDCHILD
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to set the DEPARTEDCHILDID on a sponsor type of interaction extension
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_SETDOUBLESPONSOREDCHILD ( @interactionID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Interaction ID of the interaction to add the departed child to @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Double sponsored child ID @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier = null -- Used to track who added the interaction, retrieved with USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT if null ) as begin begin try -- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
if @interactionID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Interaction ID cannot be null' end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @currentDate datetime = null set @currentDate = getdate()
update dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION set DOUBLESPONSOREDCHILDID = @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID, CHANGEDBYID = @changeAgentID, DATECHANGED = @currentDate where ID = @interactionID
end
